sentences.sentence: Several top Ukrainian officials, including the deputy head of the presidential office, resign amid a damaging corruption scandal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: He's one of several top officials who've resigned after President Volodymyr Zelensky pledged to launch a government shake-up amid allegations of high-level corruption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The Polish Defense Minister announced that he had asked Germany to agree to send Leopard tanks to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: In Berlin, NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg reiterated the importance of providing more heavy weapons to Kyiv to help repel Russian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius pointed out that the decision on these deliveries depended on the Chancellor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: BORIS PISTORIUS, German Defense Minister The question of the Leopard tanks, there is no new information yet. I have always said that I expect a decision to be made shortly and I still assume that. I have strongly encouraged partner countries that have Leopard tanks that are operational to start training Ukrainian forces on those tanks already. If you put all of this together, the German announcements, the announcements from other allies of a wide range of different types of armor to Ukraine, this is a huge additional contribution to the combat capabilities of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And this is urgent, this is important, because Russia is preparing for new offensives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin warned deliveries to Kiev of German-made Leopard tanks would not bring about anything good for the German-Russian relationship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The fear of a military escalation with Moscow and the reluctance of Berlin to assume a leadership role in the Western camp has led Germany to hesitate about sending weapons demanded by Kiev. has led Germany to hesitate about sending weapons demanded by Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: War in space is inching closer, with attacks and cyber attacks on satellites increasing, something the EU's top diplomat says is a serious cause for concern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Speaking at the opening of the European Space Conference in Brussels on Tuesday, Joseph Borre said that one of those attacks was a clear sign at the start of Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Twenty-four hours before Moscow invaded, the space telecommunication network used by the Ukrainian army was targeted by a cyberattack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And the malicious code used managed to bring down parts of the network.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Space has become a strategic area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I won't say a battlefield, but a place where satellites are or can be targeted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: We are critically dependent on information that is received or bounced back from satellites.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Most of our civilian and military infrastructure depends on the satellite system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: According to Bure, there are 5,500 satellites currently in orbit, with around 10% used by the world's military.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: And space is now defined as a key area by the world's largest military alliance, NATO.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Risks could also come from the physical destruction of satellites.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Russia recently destroyed one of its satellites with a ground-launched missile.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: If it did it to one of its own satellites, it can do it to any other satellite tomorrow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: So we have to be concerned about the safety of what we put up in space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: And this also brings with it other dangers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The destruction of a satellite fills space with small metallic particles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: They're little, but at the speed at which they go, they're tremendously dangerous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The European Commission will present a new space initiative in March, which aims to guarantee security both for people and for the continent's critical infrastructure.
